title: Are players of the same ELO actually the same skill-level in your opinion?
body: For instance, if two players are stuck at the same ELO, but one person played 600+ games to get there, and the other person played less than 100 games to get there, are they still the same skill level because they plateau'd there?  I don't think they are personally.  I think one person grinded there way to that ELO, and the other person got there because they were actually skilled.
